brandId.title: Brandid
brandId.description: Brand ID associated with the campaign.

createDate.title: CreateDate
createDate.description: Unix timestamp when campaign was created.

cspId.title: Cspid
cspId.description: Alphanumeric identifier of the CSP associated with this campaign.

isTMobileRegistered.title: IsTMobileRegistered
isTMobileRegistered.description: Indicates whether the campaign is registered with T-Mobile.
